student.Student

Packages that use Student
Package
Description
applications
This package contains various versions of Systems with their own specifications
architecture.model
Provides classes for interactions with storage space.
entry
Provides classes for user interactions and input or output student details
storage.filehandling
Provides classes required to store records into files
student.pg
Provides student classes for PG student records
student.ug
Contains classes to store UG student records
